title: Silver Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the friendly and altruistic silver dragons of the cloud-veiled peaks, these dragonborn command the power of cold. They often possess a strong sense of community and a love for the skies, reflecting the sociable and helpful nature of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Cold Breath (Silver)
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[cold_damage|Cold damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
